text: I'm not a fan of Animation Module in this build.
What happened to the brew? It doesn't look like it was updated since last time.
Generally things that make you Rhystic Study yourself to get the effect are less effectice in reality than they look on paper
And the deck isn't going to hurt for tokens.

<@U4V5EHQ2G> I'm not following the example. How is it rhystic studying myself? <@U3QMCLQQG> it's been updated. I've added lands and made a few mods, most notably to the mana rocks and a few creature and enchantment mods.
You have to pay 1 for the effect
AHHHHHHHH! Gotcha
Well if I was to remove it I would likely put Elspeth in it's slot.
I feel like we can protect planeswalkers pretty well in this type of deck.
Are you going to run any of those damage prevention/+1/+1 counter instants?
Also, Athreos is decent in this build since you get to target the opponent.
Yeah, I'm just having a hard time determining what comes out. I want to cut 2 enchantments, 1 artifact, 1 sorcery, and 1 instant to create flex slots.
And you still get the death trigger.
Yeah athreos is a house in general.
Oh, I see. I didn't realize we were already at 100
Yeah I've been tinkering most of the morning trying to lean it up and improve the focus. I have too much redundancy in some areas.
Im leaning towards athreos from my previous discussion
<@U286Q175Y> as a commander?
Yeah
My next evolution of my mono b deck
I highly suggest it. The most dominant BW deck in the local meta is athreos and it's absolutely annoying to play against. It's a control oriented build. Tons of value.
Ive played it before
It was soso for me, but i didnt spend time tunig it and i think i focused on the ability too much
Yeah it's hard to not get caught up on building to the ability. It's fantastic, but the control/value route is by far the nastiest build I've played against yet.
AFA Animation Module, it’s a natural with Ashnod’s.
